text: Mashable is a news website and entertainment company founded in 2004. == History == Mashable was founded by Pete Cashmore while living in Aberdeen, Scotland, in July 2004. The early version of the site was a WordPress blog, with Cashmore as the only author. In December 2017, Ziff Davis, a digital media company, bought Mashable for $50 million. == References == Category:Websites established in 2004 Category:News media
title: Mashable
